participant_1.background:
I'm glad I made the decision to pursue my passion.
I am a thirty-something male who decided to quit my job and travel the world for a couple of months.
I remember writing short stories and making movies with my friends when I was a child.
i love the outdoors.
my son plays on the local football team.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
i work as an extra for major motion pictures.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.

content.text: I just quit my job and am traveling the world for a couple of months.
Really, that is so cool. I have always wanted to do that.
It feels great. I am a thirty-something male and I decided to finally pursue my passion.
Writing. I love writing short stories and I have always wanted to write a novel.
That is great. I love writing too. I am an extra for major motion pictures and I love writing scripts.
That is so cool. I would love to be an extra in a movie.
It is a lot of fun. I get to meet a lot of interesting people and see the behind the scenes of movies.
That sounds really fun. I would love to do that.
You should try it. It is a lot of fun.
You should. It is a great way to meet people and have fun.
I will. Thank you for the suggestion.
